scripts.build:ui: (if exist build rmdir build /s /q) && cd ../../fullstackopen2019/part 2/phonebook && npm run build --prod && xcopy build ..\..\..\fullstackopen2019-part3\phonebook-backend\build /s /e /y /i
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
